title: Ben McAdoo mistake? Draft shockers, NFC West questions, and NFL Prospect Boye Mafe
itunes:title: Ben McAdoo mistake? Draft shockers, NFC West questions, and NFL Prospect Boye Mafe
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Panthers OC Ben McAdoo saying Sam Darnold is his starting QB.  Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara wonder if this was a mistake or could some strategy be at play?  The table debates which team will have the most shocking 1st pick before moving onto questions they have about the NFC West.  We speak with NFL prospect Boye Mafe then discuss the NFL prospects that we're falling in love with just 8 days before the Draft.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
